Day One - Null Island

I could never write a diary. But when I came across OSM’s Diaries, it gave me the idea to keep track of my OSM edits, runs, and everyday things I think of related to maps. It’s a way of keeping time and just making memories. I’ll see how it goes.

A note about this site. This is a Jekyll site using Leaflet and MapBox Javascript Libraries. All the code is in Github and served by Github Pages. Love to hear your thoughts so drop me a line on the Twittersphere if you can.
